Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Opportunity to acquire 2 commercial strata units in the Mountain View Village Centre in North Vancouver, fully leased to the Bank of Montreal, a secure "AAA" covenant tenant. The Bank of Montreal occupies the main floor "retail" space with incredible exposure onto the Main Street Commercial Corridor and a second floor "office" unit in Building 1.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the rare opportunity to acquire two adjacent properties on the 1800 block of Lonsdale Avenue. The site is 7,349 square feet with 66 feet of frontage and 111.5 feet of depth and has excellent visibility on the burgeoning retail corridor of Lonsdale Avenue. The site is currently zoned C-2 which permits mixed-use commercial/residential development with a 2.30 FSR and up to 40 feet of height. Further, the Official Community Plan suggests additional height of up to 82 feet and the potential for additional density of 0.50 FSR (2.80 FSR Total). The existing improvements consist of a single storey retail building with three separate tenants that occupy 3,158 square feet and a paved parking lot in the rear for 11 cars.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | PRIME RETAIL PROPERTY ON THE HIGHLY DESIRABLE CORRIDOR OF LONSDALE AVENUE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Five Points is centrally located on 14th and Bewicke in North Vancouver with easy access to shopping, hikes and bus routes to downtown, Lonsdale Quay/Sea Bus and Highway 1. The Five Points is an ideal investment for both owner-occupiers and investors looking to take advantage of the growing community. The property has been completely sold out and is ready for both residential and commercial possession.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | PRIME RETAIL SPACE IN MIXED-USE BUILDING

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present the opportunity to acquire 800 Marine Drive (the Subject Property), a 15,500 square foot, high profile corner site with mixed-use retail/residential development potential. Situated on the northwest corner of Marine Drive and Fell Avenue, in the City of North Vancouver, this site is located on one of the most dominant retail corridors on the North Shore.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | HIGH PROFILE CORNER SITE AT 800 MARINE DRIVE, NORTH VANCOUVER

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:

Personal Real Estate Corporation

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited has been retained by the Owner on an exclusive basis to offer the 100% interest in 1622 Pemberton Avenue, a well-maintained retail building located in the Norgate/Pemberton neighbourhood of North Vancouver. The property is well positioned on a rectangular shaped 7,920 Sq. Ft. site in a high exposure area on the East side of Pemberton Avenue and just slightly south of the Marine Drive Commercial Corridor. The existing tenant Cloverdale Paint has occupied the building since 2006 and currently holds a lease until 2023, with no option to renew beyond this term, providing an excellent opportunity for a future owner/occupier. The current rent is also well below market rate; please contact agents to further discuss.With its prime location, the property is well positioned for retail use and may offer future redevelopment and/or assembly potential with the neighbouring property.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | EXCELLENT INVESTMENT FOR OWNER-OCCUPIER OR POTENTIAL REDEVELOPMENT
